Thanks it works!

Instructions:
1: Download
2: Run "sambc-fb.exe"
(Note: If you don't know what "x64" means in the name of "sambc-fb-x64.exe", you can completely ignore that file, because it doesn't pertain to you (most likely))
3: Click "Next", then "I Agree".
4: On the current page, there should be three check boxes. Just make sure that the first and the third check boxes are checked, the second one is up to you, since it just adds a shortcut on the desktop.
5: Continue on with installation process as required by installer (Just keep clicking next, etc.)
6: Run SAM Broadcaster for the first time.
7: Navigate to the top of SAM, then click on File -> Config
8: Locate "Registration Key" on the left side of the Configuration window that you should now have open, then click it.
9: Open the "Serial.txt" which came with this download, and copy the given serial into the field on the "Registration Key" menu.
(Note: the serial key looks similar to this:
VVVVV-WWWWW-XXXXX-YYYYY-ZZZZZ)
10: Click "OK" near the bottom of the Configuration window, then exit SAM Broadcaster.
11: Assuming SAM is now entirely closed out of, run the "samreset.exe" included in this download. It should finish just as soon as it opens. Click "OK" on that, and you're all set.

Hope this helps, I'm sure any questions you may have can be answered by posting a comment here and awaiting a fellow pirate.

And to the submitter, it may be a good idea to resubmit this torrent using the .torrent file generated by TPB, in order to include information about the download (and possible the above instructions, if you'd like).
